SEARCH
Package com.bankapp.models

Class SavingAccount

java.lang.Object
com.bankapp.models.Account
com.bankapp.models.SavingAccount
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Account>
public class SavingAccount extends Account implements Serializable
Represents a savings account within the bank application.

  • Constructor Details

    • SavingAccount

      public SavingAccount(Client client, double balance, int RIB, Date openingDate, Date closingDate, boolean isDisabled, PaymentCollection payments, TransactionCollection transactions, LoanCollection loans, double interestRate, CurrentAccount currentAccount, double monthlyDeposit)
      Constructs a new SavingAccount with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      client - the client who owns the account
      balance - the initial balance of the account
      RIB - the unique identifier for the account
      openingDate - the date the account was opened
      closingDate - the date the account will be closed
      isDisabled - whether the account is disabled
      payments - the collection of payments associated with the account
      transactions - the collection of transactions associated with the account
      loans - the collection of loans associated with the account
      interestRate - the interest rate applied to the account
      currentAccount - the current account linked to this savings account
      monthlyDeposit - the required monthly deposit for the account

      Gets the interest rate applied to the account.
      Returns:
      the interest rate of the account

      Returns:
      the monthly deposit amount

    • applyInterest

      public void applyInterest() throws InvalidDepositException
      Applies the interest to the account balance.
      Throws:
      InvalidDepositException - if the deposit amount is invalid

    • transfer

      public void transfer(double amount) throws InsufficientFundsException, InvalidDepositException
      Transfers a specified amount from this savings account to the linked current account.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to transfer
      Throws:
      InsufficientFundsException - if there are insufficient funds for the transfer
      InvalidDepositException - if the deposit amount is invalid

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(SavingAccount other)
      Compares this savings account to another based on the balance.
      Parameters:
      other - the other savings account to compare to
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this account's balance is less than, equal to, or greater than the other account's balance
